question: According to the report of centre _______ lakh GSTIN registration have been done till 18th of this month.
explanation: According to the report of centre over 77.55 lakh GSTIN registration have been done till 18th of this month. In GST registration, the supplier is allotted a 15-digit GST identification number called GSTIN. Registration of any business entity under the GST Law requires obtaining a unique number from the concerned tax authorities for the purpose of collecting tax on behalf of the government.
